Welcome to the future in lighting solutions.

We don’t just do lighting. We do aesthetic illumination, paired with pioneering technology that is both user-friendly and cutting edge.

Projects by ild

Innovation is more than a buzzword for us, it’s a way of life.

At ILD, we understand the value that lighting adds to architecture and space design. Our aim is to create energy efficient, technology-driven and aesthetically stunning lighting solutions for our clients across various segments.

ILD Text

With the trust of the leading light manufacturers from across the world, we are in a unique position to offer the best of the best to our customers, making ILD a preferred lighting solutions provider in south and south east Asia.

Our dedicated team combines cutting edge technology with user-centric techniques to create the right lighting for every space, be it for a home, a monument, university, or high-end offices.
